articles.title: The European Super League may be on hold, but it will be back - ABC News
articles.description: When 12 of the most successful and powerful football clubs in the world announced they had formed the European Super League, the outcry was loud, swift, effective — and predictable, writes Tracey Holmes.
articles.content:
